title: Biden, other G-20 world leaders formally endorse groundbreaking global corporate minimum tax
content:
1. Biden, other G-20 world leaders formally endorse groundbreaking global corporate minimum tax  The Washington Post
  2. LIVE: U.S. President Joe Biden meets Italy's President Sergio Mattarella ahead of G20 summit  Reuters
  3. The G-20 gets together for the 1st time since the pandemic. Here's what you missed  NPR
  4. A Global Tax Deal Is at Hand. Here’s How It Would Work.  The New York Times
  5. Biden arrives in Rome for G20 Summit as domestic agenda hangs in the balance  CBS Mornings
